biotools.summary: The cms is an R package that uses tabular data from rat epilepsy studies and applies a composite measures scheme (via PCA) to select the most prominent features. Further, variables can be selected to perform cluster analysis on a subset in order to build a composite score. Finally, the cluster distribution is displayed for the subgroups and allows severity assessment between animal models.

bioschemas.name: CMS
